about_the_game:
"As I Began to Dream" is an enchanting puzzle-platformer that merges a unique environment manipulation mechanic. Utilize this power to navigate dream worlds, solve puzzles, and aid Lily's escape from her dream realm.



Players will play as Lily, a little girl who tragically loses both of her parents in an accident. She awakens in a dream world where she finds herself trapped with no way out. She must use her power to control and manipulate the world around her to escape her dream world. As she journeys through the dream world with her turtle friend Flippy, players will encounter many puzzles that require manipulating the environment to solve them and progress in Lily's journey.




Lily will visit various dream worlds that reflect the traumas she experienced, remembering what happened to her, and together with Flippy, she will overcome it all in this hand-crafted journey.

  • Unleash a captivating puzzle and manipulation mechanic: swap and rotate the environment around you, and find a way out of every puzzle!
  • Explore tranquil-yet-mysterious dream worlds for 4-6 hours.
  • Encounter diverse worlds with their unique creature that will help you along your journey.
  • Immerse yourself in rich, hand-drawn visuals across different dream worlds.
  • Enjoy a beautiful soundtrack featuring over 20 original tracks.
